rows.label: tlk42400045_03_msg0001
rows.name: Tolulu's new employer is Ion-chan, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400045_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I was so bored with no work, I was playing by sliding
down the waterway next to the great stairs leading
to the Calam Ruins when she invited me, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400045_03_msg0003
rows.name:
The job of ticket-taker at
the Bajena Playhouse...
It's quite rewarding, mo!

rows.label: tlk42400045_03_msg0004
rows.name:
...But it seems she's paying Tolulu's
salary from her own pocket money,
so I feel a little bad, mo.
